description.narrative: Financial Resources and Stewardship, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes.
